title: PBE Account Information
body: I have a PBE account but the problem is that since I haven't used it in a very long time I now forgot all of my information (Name and Password). What can i do to get it back in some way?

replies.body: If you have the PBE client installed on your computer, you can try a basic recovery from the login screen. If you need further assistance recovering the PBE account, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and one of our specialists will gladly assist you.
